title: SAPD: Accidental shooting between friends sends one man to the hospital
content:
SAN ANTONIO- San Antonio Police are investigating an accidental shooting between friends in the 9500 block of Perrin-Beitel Road on Sunday.
Sgt. Eddie Rohmer said one man in his early 40s has been sent to the hospital with a gun shot wound to the abdomen.
Rohmer said the two men involved are friends. The victim is in critical condition and was taken to San Antonio Military Medical Center.
This story will be updated as more information becomes available.
kbradshaw@express-news.net
